ygData.subject: Re: Fishbone earring
ygData.msgSnippet: ... is ... with ... Yes, they are mid 30s and VERY mean.  They will all attack at once.  When I first started playing Everquest I was fighting in the hills
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Gorbag@...
>
> I have heard he is in the mid 30 range. However I've also heard that he
is
> linked to the other two NPCs near him so you'd need to be able to deal
with
> them all at once.
>
Yes, they are mid 30s and VERY mean. They will all attack at once. When I
first started playing Everquest I was fighting in the hills near them when
all of a sudden they all came out and killed me. They then proceeded to kill
everyone in the zone before they went back to the lake.

Mark
